Text:
Got this to work on my rooted Kindle Fire HD 7". Thank you very much!

I figured out that you need to copy the exact folder into the OBB folder, not just the OBB file itself. That's how to fix the download problem thing.

Your directory structure should look like this:

Android/obb/com.square_enix.android_googleplay.FFIII_GP/main.102.com.square_enix.android_googleplay.FFIII_GP.obb
